content.description:
This is a cool/weird project that if it goes won’t be super hard but will only suit certain climbers. The rock is good quality and tall. 

  Start at the obvious foot ramp, and move up the crimps into the scum.
content.protection: Pads.  Watch for stumps on the landing.
content.location: It is on the big boulder with the hidey hole beneath it.

content.description:
Sit start with a crimp for your left and the sharp pod in the seam for you your right. Move to the arete, and top out.   

  It is short.
content.location: It ascends the face under the far right of the arete. This is on the same boulder as the Scum Arete, which starts on the far left.

content.description: Squat start the gently overhanging arete starting the left side, and head right turning the corner to the high point. This is slopey and burly with no feet but excellent rock.
content.location: On the smaller boulder, this is the the obvious low arete.

content.description: Sit start with the great jug, and move left up the arete on worsening crimps.
content.protection: Pads. Despite the name, this isn’t spicy.
content.location:
This is on a hidden boulder right near the loading dock. It forms part of the containment wall. 

  Given the proximity to the loading dock, this boulder is best visited on a Sunday or any day there is no one around.

content.description: These are a couple of boulders down behind the loading docks of one of the shipping warehouse in the industrial park. There is also a nice boulder right on the edge of the parking lot, but there always people back there, and it's on private property.
